name: Pin Crasher (itch)
description:
STRIKE! Gameplay

Hunt for Highscores in this endless Bowling game.
Try to stay on the alley and keep the timer up!
Or just dodge obstacles and throw those precious strikes in the Zen mode.

Cosmetics

Visit the store regularly to unlock new skins for the bowling alley, your ball, the pins, announcer voices and even music!
Who knows? Maybe there'll even be some special event skins?

Competitive

Compare your Highscores with your friends or on Twitter with #PinCrasher!
Who is the best Pin Crasher player among you?

Join the Community

Follow us on Twitter and join our Discord to never miss any updates on this or our other games!
